metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36584 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GPAC 1.0.1. There is a heap-based bufferoverflow in the function gp_rtp_builder_do_tx3g function inietf/rtp_pck_3gpp.c, as demonstrated by MP4Box. This can cause a denial ofservice (DOS).

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
